title: How to Fix Caramel Corn with Peanuts

steps.headline: Combine the peanuts and popcorn into that pan.
Combine the corn syrup, butter, brown sugar and salt in that saucepan.
Bring the combination to a boil
Boil 5 minutes without stirring.
steps.description: Take off of heat and let cool, then eventually you can stir in the vanilla and the baking soda

steps.headline: Pour your warm good smelling caramel mixture over the now finished popcorn, and let bake the popcorn in oven for 1 hour at the old temperature, 250 °F (121 °C)
Let cool and break apart with hands and store in that airtight container as needed in Things you Need

text: Take your cooking spray.  Grease your pan.  Combine the peanuts and popcorn into that pan. Cook at 250 °F (121 °C) in your oven Making the Caramel Sauce  Combine the corn syrup, butter, brown sugar and salt in that saucepan.  Bring the combination to a boil  Boil 5 minutes without stirring. Take off of heat and let cool, then eventually you can stir in the vanilla and the baking soda Pour your warm good smelling caramel mixture over the now finished popcorn, and let bake the popcorn in oven for 1 hour at the old temperature, 250 °F (121 °C)  Let cool and break apart with hands and store in that airtight container as needed in Things you Need
